jdw.graphics
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  jdw.graphics.Matrix

public final class Matrix
extends Object

A 4x4 matrix. This class is immutable.

Calculates the product of two matrices and returns the result.

Parameters:
m1 - the first matrix
m2 - the second matrix
Returns:
a matrix representing m1 * m2
Throws:

rotationYawPitchRoll

public static Matrix rotationYawPitchRoll(float yaw,
                                          float pitch,
                                          float roll)
Creates a matrix with the specified yaw, pitch and roll. The rotation around the z-axis is done first, followed by rotation around the x-axis, followed by rotation around the y-axis. Duplicates the semantics of the D3DXMatrixRotationYawPitchRoll function in the D3DX utility library.

Parameters:
yaw - yaw around the Y-axis, in radians
pitch - pitch around the X-axis, in radians
roll - roll around the Z-axis, in radians
Returns:
the new rotation matrix
